*** Hello from HeadStart! ------------------------------------------------------------ We hope you are having a great time on NCS and enjoyed Showcase!
During Showcase, you should have heard about HeadStart.
Great news! Applications are now OPEN!
HeadStart is an exclusive programme designed for NCS with The Challenge graduates!
Apply here now! https://www.headstart-thechallenge.org/confirm-email/
Applications close midnight Sunday 24th July.
Here's that animation you saw on Showcase! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Z4y4AvgpLEk
There are so many benefits! > Positively impact your community > Challenge yourself > Skills & experience for your future > Expert CV advice and insights > Tailored interview preparation > Learn from global business leaders
Any questions? Email us at headstart@the-challenge.org
